title: Swap MissionSection mascot image to plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp

requirements.summary: Update only the MissionSection mascot src to use the uploaded plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp via assetPath(), and add the image under public generated assets.
acceptanceCriteria: plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp and is served at /assets/generated/plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp (base-path aware).
Only the MissionSection mascot elementâ€™s src is changed; alt text, classes, surrounding markup, and all other page elements remain unchanged.
The updated image loads correctly when the app is hosted under both '/' and a non-root subpath (using assetPath()).

file_operations.description: Add the newly uploaded image asset so it can be served as a static file at a base-path-aware URL.

Change ONLY the mascot element (the one corresponding to XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) src from assetPath('assets/generated/image-1.webp') to assetPath('assets/generated/plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp'), leaving alt text, className, and all surrounding markup unchanged.
